title: South Africans Cast Ballots 20 Years Since Apartheid
teaser: This election marks 20 years since Nelson Mandela was elected and will be the first since his death. Renee Montagne talks to Verashni Pillay, associate editor for the Mail & Guardian in Johannesburg.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
